summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1206, for the improvement of East Cherry Street, from Twenty-ninth Avenue to a point one hundred twenty (120) feet west of Thirty-second Avenue; Thirtieth Avenue, from East Jefferson Street to East Columbia Street; and Thirty-first Avenue, from East Jefferson Street to East Cherry Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein sewers of proper dimensions, together with other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13302 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
